snippet: Mikel Landa of Spain broke away from the pack and sustained that lead as he won the fifth stage of the Tour of Basque Country, while Sergio Henao of Colombia retained the overall leader’s jersey.
lead_paragraph: Mikel Landa of Spain broke away from the pack and sustained that lead as he won the fifth stage of the Tour of Basque Country, while Sergio Henao of Colombia retained the overall leader’s jersey.

headline.main: Colombian Keeps Tour of Basque Country Lead
